SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_DEL_FL, SIGNUP_DATE, AUTHORITY, PROFILE_IMG, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_ADDRESS, DEFAULT_FL, FARM_IMG, REPORT_NO, REPORT_TYPE, REPORT_MEMBER_NO, REPORT_TARGET_NO, REPORT_REASON, REPORT_DATE, REPORT_PENALTY, PROCESS_DATE, REPORT_CONTENT, RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY REPORT_TARGET_NO ORDER BY REPORT_NO DESC) AS RANKING FROM MEMBER LEFT JOIN ADDRESS USING(MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN SELLER USING(MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN REPORT ON (MEMBER_NO = REPORT_TARGET_NO) WHERE MEMBER_ID != 'admin' ORDER BY MEMBER_NO) WHERE RANKING = 1
AND AUTHORITY = 0
AND AUTHORITY = 1
AND AUTHORITY = 3
AND AUTHORITY = 4
AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N' AND (REPORT_PENALTY IS NULL OR REPORT_PENALTY = 'N') AND REPORT_TYPE IS NULL
AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N' AND REPORT_PENALTY IS NULL AND REPORT_TYPE IS NOT NULL
AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N' AND REPORT_PENALTY = 'Y' AND PROCESS_DATE IS NOT NULL
AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'Y'
AND (MEMBER_ID LIKE('%${keyword}%') OR MEMBER_ID LIKE LOWER('%${keyword}%') OR MEMBER_ID LIKE UPPER('%${keyword}%') OR MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE ('%${keyword}%') OR MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE LOWER('%${keyword}%') OR MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE ('%${keyword}%') OR MEMBER_NO LIKE ('%${keyword}%'))
